page.title: 01Our area
page.content: In our area the land is arable.The soil is very rich.There are quite a few big farms in the area.Stebbing is a small village .It has a particularly famous church.There is also a very old mill and the mound,which was a motte and bailey. There are two big houses called Priors Hall and Porters Hall. There are a lot of things to do around here such as horse riding, shooting and hunting. Many people go out of the area to work,even commuting to London. There are many interesting historical buildings. There are also several unusual small industries in our area.
